org.alljoyn.config.client

Interface ConfigClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.alljoyn.services.common.ClientBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigClientImpl

    public interface ConfigClient
extends org.alljoyn.services.common.ClientBase
    An interface for retrieval and setting of remote IoE device's Config data. Encapsulates the ConfigTransport BusInterface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void factoryReset()
      Direct the device to disconnect from the personal AP, clear all previously configured data, and start the soft AP mode.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getConfig(java.lang.String languageTag)
      Return all the updatable configuration fields based on the language tag.
      void ResetConfigurations(java.lang.String language, java.lang.String[] fieldsToRemove)
      Remove/Clear the configuration data specified by the field list.
      void restart()
      This method restarts or power cycles the device.
      void setConfig(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> config, java.lang.String languageTag)
      Update the configuration data with the given map.
      void setPasscode(java.lang.String daemonRealm, char[] newPasscode)
      Change the passphrase.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.alljoyn.services.common.ClientBase

        connect, disconnect, getPeerName, getSessionId, getVersion, initBus, isConnected

    • Method Detail

      • getConfig

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getConfig(java.lang.String languageTag)
                                                           throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
        Return all the updatable configuration fields based on the language tag. If language tag is not specified (i.e. ""), configuration fields based on device's default language are returned.
        Parameters:
        languageTag - IETF language tags specified by RFC 5646
        Returns:
        All the configuration fields based on the language tag.
        Throws:
        BusException. - If a language tag is not supported by the device, Alljoyn error org.alljoyn.Error.LanguageNotSupported is returned.
        org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
        See Also:
        AboutKeys

      • setConfig

        void setConfig(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> config,
             java.lang.String languageTag)
               throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
        Update the configuration data with the given map. Only the fields listed in the map will be updated. Whenever there is an error, the AllJoyn error code org.alljoyn.Error.InvalidValue will be returned and the error message will contain the field name of the invalid field.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration map. The change will only apply to keys that are inside the map
        languageTag - IETF language tags specified by RFC 5646
        Throws:
        BusException. - If a language tag is not supported by the device, Alljoyn error org.alljoyn.Error.LanguageNotSupported is returned. Whenever there is an error, the AllJoyn error code org.alljoyn.Error.InvalidValue will be returned
        org.alljoyn.bus.BusException

      • setPasscode

        void setPasscode(java.lang.String daemonRealm,
               char[] newPasscode)
                 throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
        Change the passphrase. The passcode is used for secure interfaces. Both fields are user-entered.
        Parameters:
        daemonRealm - passcode+DaemonRealm is used by the client to authenticate with the restricted daemon.
        newPasscode - the new passcode
        Throws:
        BusException. - If this feature is not allowed by the OEM, the AllJoyn error code org.alljoyn.Error.FeatureNotAvailable will be returned.
        org.alljoyn.bus.BusException

      • restart

        void restart()
             throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
        This method restarts or power cycles the device.
        Throws:
        org.alljoyn.bus.BusException

      • factoryReset

        void factoryReset()
                  throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
        Direct the device to disconnect from the personal AP, clear all previously configured data, and start the soft AP mode. Some device may not support this feature.
        Throws:
        BusException. - A FeatureNotAvailable exception will be thrown if the device doesn't support the feature
        org.alljoyn.bus.BusException

      • ResetConfigurations

        void ResetConfigurations(java.lang.String language,
                       java.lang.String[] fieldsToRemove)
                         throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
        Remove/Clear the configuration data specified by the field list. Whenever there is an error, the AllJoyn error code org.alljoyn.Error.InvalidValue will be returned and the error message will contain the field name of the invalid field.
        Parameters:
        language - IETF language tags specified by RFC 5646
        fieldsToRemove - the fields to remove for this language
        Throws:
        BusException. - If a language tag is not supported by the device, Alljoyn error org.alljoyn.Error.LanguageNotSupported is returned. Whenever there is an error, the AllJoyn error code org.alljoyn.Error.InvalidValue will be returned
        org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
